item.title: Terry Tempest Williams :: Coyote Clan -Books: The Hour of Land
item.description:
Terry Tempest Williams :: Coyote Clan -Books: The Hour of Land

Terry Tempest Williams, author of The Hour of Land (2016, Sarah Crichton Books/Farrar, Straus & Giroux, When Women Were Birds (2012, Farrar, Straus & Giroux), Finding Beauty in a Broken World (2008, Pantheon Books), The Open Space of Democracy (Orion, 2004), Red: Passion and Patience in the Desert (Pantheon, 2001), LEAP (Pantheon, 2000), Refuge, and many other books, is an author, naturalist, and environmental activist.
